description: Vivo V60 will be launched in India next month, according to a tipster. The company's OriginOS operating system skin, based on Android 16, is said to debut in the country alongside the phone. The Vivo V60 is speculated to debut as a modified version of the Vivo S30, which was launched in China in May.
title: Vivo V60 India Launch Date Tipped; Said to Be First Global Model to Arrive With OriginOS

description: WeTransfer clarified it won't use user-uploaded files for AI model training, following user backlash for updates to its terms of service that suggested the platform could "reproduce, distribute, modify" content for moderation. The file transfer service has now updated its terms again, removing all references to using machine learning with user files, aiming to address irate users' privacy concerns.
title: WeTransfer Confirms Files Not Used to Train AI Models Following Criticism, Updates Terms of Service

description: The Asus Vivobook S14 (S3407CA) has a premium and sleek design language. The laptop packs a 14-inch Full HD+ IPS display that offers decent colours. It also features a powerful Intel Core Ultra 7 processor that can handle most of the daily tasks. Check out the review to learn more about the latest Asus laptop.
title: Asus Vivobook S14 (S3407CA) Review: A Dependable Productivity Laptop

description: Apple will reportedly ditch Titanium for the iPhone 17 Pro models this year. The brand could use the Titanium material exclusively for the new iPhone 17 Air. The Titanium build could make the phone more durable. The iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Pro, and iPhone 17 Pro Max could get an Aluminium frame.
title: iPhone 17 Pro, iPhone 17 Pro Max Could Ditch Titanium for Aluminium Frame

description: Meta AI reportedly had a vulnerability that could be exploited to access other users’ private conversations with the chatbot. As per the report, a researcher found the bug late last year and informed the Menlo Park-based social media giant about it. The company then deployed a fix to the issue in January, and rewarded the researcher for finding the exploit.
title: Meta AI Vulnerability That Could Leak Users’ Private Conversations Fixed: Report

description: OpenAI’s rumoured under-development artificial intelligence (AI) web browser might be called Aura internally. A tipster has found evidence of the name Aura within ChatGPT’s code, leading to the belief that it could be what the company is calling the browser internally. Aura was said to be mentioned along with several other elements associated with browsers.
title: OpenAI’s Under-Development AI-Powered Web Browser Said to Be Codenamed Aura

description: Samsung has released the first beta version of its One UI 8 Watch user interface for Galaxy Watch 5 and Watch 5 Pro, according to a tipster. However, the tipster added that the beta program will be exclusively available in South Korea and the US. The tech giant's latest smartwatches, the Galaxy Watch 8 series, runs One UI 8 Watch out of the box and were unveiled at the Galaxy Unpacked event on July 9.
title: Samsung’s First One UI 8 Watch Beta Reportedly Available for Galaxy Watch 5 Series

description: Acer Swift Lite 14 AI PC has launched in India with up to Intel Core Ultra CPUs and up to 32GB RAM. It runs Windows 11 Home and supports various AI-powered features. The 1.1kg laptop sports a 14-inch OLED display with a 180-degree hinge, and packs a 50Wh battery. It will be sold in two colourways in India.
title: Acer Swift Lite 14 AI PC Launched in India With 14-Inch OLED Display, Up to Intel Core Ultra 5 CPU

description: Google Discover, the personalised news and blog feed within the Google app on smartphones, is reportedly getting a new artificial intelligence (AI) feature. As per the report, the feed is replacing news headlines and direct links to news articles with an AI-generated summary, similar to the AI Overviews feature on Search.
title: Google Discover Reportedly Showing AI Summaries of News Articles to Some Users

description: TCL has launched its new C72K QD-Mini LED TV range in India, available in five screen sizes. The series features QD-Mini LED technology, Google TV OS, advanced gaming features, and energy-saving modes for an enhanced viewing experience. The smart TVs have a starting price tag of Rs. 84,990 for the 55-inch option.
title: TCL C72K QD Mini‑LED TV With 144Hz Refresh Rate, Dolby Atmos Launched in India

description: After launching the Vivo Y400 Pro 5G in India on June 20, the Chinese smartphone manufacturer is reportedly preparing to unveil the non-Pro model of the handset in India as well. Vivo Y400 5G is expected to launch in India in August in two colourways. The Pro-model of the rumoured phone sports a 6.77-inch 3D curved display, and features a MediaTek Dimensity 7300 SoC.
title: Vivo Y400 5G Could Launch in India in August; Price and Colour Options Tipped

description: Anish believes there is a paradigm shift in India's mobile gaming culture. “I think there's a big leap that we are seeing in the gaming trends right now, and how even parents have started to see gaming as one of the options,” he added. He further mentions that it is “no longer just something you do in idle time—it’s something people aspire to.”
title: “Think Gaming, Think Infinix”: CEO Anish Kapoor on Infinix's Mission to Democratise Mobile Gaming in India

description: OnePlus 2-in-1 SUPERVOOC Cable has been launched in the US. The 8A cable, which is 120cm in length, will allow users to charge a smartphone and a smartwatch simultaneously. The product is currently listed on the company website, however, the estimated deliveries will start from July 24 for priority orders and July 25 for standard orders.
title: OnePlus 2-In-1 Charging Cable Launched; Can Charge Smartwatch, Phone Together

description: OpenAI is reportedly developing new productivity tools for ChatGPT that could reduce users’ reliance on Microsoft’s Excel and PowerPoint. As per the report, the San Francisco-based artificial intelligence (AI) firm is working on adding support for Microsoft’s spreadsheet and presentation file formats, so users can both create and edit these files directly within the chatbot’s interface.
title: OpenAI Reportedly Working on ChatGPT Support for Microsoft Excel and PowerPoint-Compatible Files
OPPO Reno14 Series First Look: The Perfect Camera Phones Under Rs. 50,000 in 2025?

description: Realme 15 Pro 5G and Realme 15 5G are all set to launch in India on July 24. While Realme is actively teasing details about the new lineup, a few other specifications of the phones have surfaced on the Web. The standard variant is confirmed to feature MediaTek Dimensity 7300+ SoC. It will measure 7.66mm in thickness.
title: Realme 15 5G to Use a MediaTek Dimensity 7300+ SoC; Camera, Display Details Tipped

description: Samsung is surveying users about integrating built-in magnets into future smartphones to enable full Qi2 wireless charging support. This potential change, which might slightly increase device thickness, is being explored through the Samsung Members app. While the current Galaxy S25 series supports faster Qi2 charging, it lacks these magnets, unlike some other devices like the HMD Skyline.
title: Samsung Survey Reportedly Asks Users About Future Smartphones With Qi2 Magnets

description: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 was launched last week as the thinnest and lightest Galaxy Z Fold series device yet. Soon after its debut, Honor attempted to steal the spotlight by claiming that its Magic V5 is thinner than the latest book-style Galaxy foldable. However, a recent side-by-side comparison suggests otherwise. Real-life images indicate that the Galaxy Z Fold 7 may have slightly less thickness than the Honor Magic V5, despite that not being the case on paper.
title: Samsung's Galaxy Z Fold 7 Said to Be Slimmer Than the Honor Magic V5

description: Chennai City Gangsters is a Tamil comedy movie that revolves around four ex-gangsters and a bank employee, who team up to rob a bank. However, things will take a turn as two mysterious strangers interrupt the heist in the middle. The stakes will change, and so will the narrative. Streaming now.
title: Chennai City Gangsters Now Streaming on Amazon Prime Video: What You Need to Know About This Tamil Comedy Drama

description: Google has rolled out a new offer for university students in India which grants them access to a complimentary subscription to the AI Pro membership. The plan usually costs Rs. 1,950 per month but can be subscribed to free-of-cost for a period of one year. With Google AI Pro, subscribers get access to the Gemini 2.5 Pro AI model, along with Deep Research on Gemini 2.5 Pro.
title: Google Rolls Out Free 1-Year AI Pro Subscription for Students in India: How to Get It

description: iPhone 17 was earlier said to get the same A18 chip used in the iPhone 16. Now,  GF Securities analyst Jeff Pu states that iPhone 17 will run on the A19 chip. The iPhone 17 Air is also said to run on this chipset. Meanwhile, the iPhone 17 Pro models are said to feature the A19 Pro chip.
title: iPhone 17 Said to Get Upgraded Chipset, Could Offer 8GB of RAM

description: Lava Agni 3 was unveiled in India in October 2023. Now, a report has surfaced that suggests that the company could be working on the rumoured successor of the smartphone, the Lava Agni 4. The report has also shared the supposed design, specifications, and pricing of the phone. The Lava Agni 4 is said to be powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 8350 SoC, and feature a dual rear camera setup.
title: Lava Agni 4 Said to Launch in India Soon; Design, Key Specifications and Pricing Leaked

description: Mistral released its first speech understanding models on Tuesday. Dubbed Voxtral, it is an open-source audio generation artificial intelligence (AI) model that not only turns text into speech but can also understand text to generate speech as a response natively. These models are available in two sizes of 24 billion parameters and three billion parameters.
title: Mistral Releases Voxtral, Its First Open-Source Speech Generation AI Models With Native Language Understanding

description: Sakamoto Days is the new anime, and its Season 1 part 2 is all set to release on Netflix. The story covers the life of Tara Sakotoma, a retired hitman who runs a store. It covers how, to protect his family, he goes to great lengths while maintaining his identity as a normal being. The anime is a perfect blend of action and humor.
title: Sakamoto Days Season 1 Part 2 Now Streaming on Netflix: What You Need to Kno

description: Samsung is said to be planning the launch of four new products in India. According to a tipster’s claims on social media, the South Korean tech conglomerate’s upcoming lineup may include three new tablets — Samsung Galaxy Tab S10 Lite, Galaxy Tab S11, and the Galaxy Tab S11 Ultra. Further, a new smartphone is also said to be on track to be launched in India. It is tipped to be the Galaxy A17 5G.
title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S10 Lite, Galaxy Tab S11 Series and Galaxy A17 5G Tipped to Launch in India

description: A new web series, The Girlfriend, covers the story of a woman named Luara, who has a promising career, a family, and the glam and charm. Her life alters when her son introduces her to his Girlfriend, she makes a damn good impression, and Laura is a bit worried for her son to understand if trusting his Girlfriend entirely is right or no, as she believes his Girlfriend is just trying to make a name in the society using the name, but again, is she just paranoid, one can only make out after watching the series.
title: The Girlfriend OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Apple's iPhone Fold, its first foldable iPhone will feature a display designed and produced by Samsung Display, according to analyst Ming-Chi Kuo. The internal hinges, or display metal plates, are said to be produced by another South Korean firm that currently supplies similar components for Samsung's existing foldable phones.
title: Apple to Equip iPhone Fold With Samsung Display's Crease-Free Screen: Ming-Chi Kuo

description: Layoffs in tech never really stopped in the post-pandemic world. Since the end of 2021, tech companies have been laying off employees in large numbers. Unfortunately, 2025 was also not different, as tech giants such as Intel, Microsoft, Meta, and Salesforce made headlines for their mass layoffs.
title: Layoffs in 2025: HP, Intel, Meta, Microsoft, Ola and More Fire Over 75,000 Staffers; AI the Main Culprit

description: Honor X70 was launched in China in four colour options. It houses a large 8,300mAh battery with 80W wired charging support and boasts a 6.79-inch AMOLED display. The phone ships with a Snapdragon 6 Gen 4 chipset alongside 12 GB of RAM. It gets a 50-megapixel primary rear camera with OIS. The Honor X70 is currently available for purchase in China.
title: Honor X70 With 8,300mAh Battery, Snapdragon 6 Gen 4 SoC Launched: Price, Specifications

description: Cyberpunk 2077: Ultimate Edition is all set to arrive on Mac computers this week. On Monday, developer CD Projekt Red announced that it will be compatible on Mac models running Apple Silicon chipsets, which is M1 or later. It is the complete version of the open-world role-playing game (RPG) which debuted in 2020, bundling all of the post launch content including the Phantom Liberty expansion. On Mac, Cyberpunk 2077: Ultimate Edition will take advantage of MetalFX upscaling and offer spatial audio support.
title: Cyberpunk 2077: Ultimate Edition Coming to Apple Silicon-Powered Mac on July 17

description: Samsung has recently been moving away from the S-Pen. Its latest book-style foldable, the Galaxy Z Fold 7, misses out on S-Pen support to offer a more sleek appearance. However, a latest report coming out of South Korea has suggested that the tech giant may be again looking to incorporate support for the stylus in future versions of the Galaxy Z foldable, and they could even get a dedicated slot for it.
title: Samsung Developing New Technologies to Bring Back S-Pen in Future Galaxy Z Fold Models: Report

description: Curved displays are a defining aesthetic on a smartphone. In this article, we have curated a list of the top curved display phones in India, including the OnePlus 13, Oppo Find X8 Pro, Motorola Edge 60 Pro, Vivo Y400 Pro 5G, and more, to help you make an informed buying decision.
title: Top Curved Display Phones in India (July 2025): OnePlus 13, Motorola Edge 60 Pro, Vivo Y400 Pro 5G, and More
